import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { useHistory } from "react-router-dom"; import {Link} from "react-router-dom"; import AdminDashboardForAll from "../AdminDashboardForAll"; import {FaStar, FaBackward, FaArrowDown, FaPlus} from "react-icons/fa"; import axios from "axios"; const AddBook = () =>{ let history = useHistory(); const [book, setUser] = useState({ title: "", author: "", edition: "", publisher: "", publication_date: "", copies: "", category: "", rackno: "" }); const { title, author, edition, publisher, publication_date, copies, category, rackno} = book; const onInputChange = e => { setUser({ ...book, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); }; const onSubmit = async e => { e.preventDefault(); await axios.post("http://localhost:3001/books", book); history.push("/"); }; return( <>
